General.Name: Winstech Precision Hldg Co
General.Description: Winstech Precision Holding Co., LTD. engages in research, development, stamping, welding, and assembly of precision tooling and parts for the automotive industry. The company offers molds/fixtures, such as parting dies, single- and multi-process molds, checkers and fixtures, and other molds; and parts/welding assemblies, including dashboard, car seat, exhaust, car door frame, heat exchange, chassis, automotive anti-collision, OA electronic, and other products. It has operations in the United States, Spain, France, Germany, the Czech Republic, the United Kingdom, Mexico, Japan, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Dongguan, China.
